sectionNotes: Restricted to English or Rhetoric or Media and Cinema Studies or Creative Writing major(s) or minor(s).
sectionText: Topic Section F: Screenwriting PREREQ: CW 100 or CW 104 This is an introductory class in the art of screenwriting.  You?ll learn screenplay format and technique through reading, written exercises, workshops and discussion.  Meanwhile, you?ll develop a premise and an outline for your own feature-length screenplay.  Next, we?ll move into full-workshop mode, and you?ll write the first third of your screenplay.
